forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 83. West wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 64. Southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
Boston gazes upon a sun-drenched afternoon, warmth enveloping the city with a gentle embrace. The azure sky stretches endlessly, punctuated only by the occasional fluffy cloud lazily drifting by, as a light breeze whispers through the streets. The forecast promises a high around 83, inviting residents and visitors alike to revel in this perfect blend of sun and gentle wind. As day gives way to night, the temperature will settle comfortably into the mid-60s, with a clear skyline promising a peaceful evening.

For those fortunate enough to step outside, light, breathable fabrics are recommended—perhaps a favorite cotton shirt paired with crisp shorts to fully enjoy the day’s offerings. The pleasant weather encourages leisurely walks along the waterfront or a serene afternoon in one of the city's historic parks. Consider carrying a light jacket for the evening when the warmth will begin to melt away; sunsets in Boston have a charm of their own, casting an inviting glow over the city. Whether it's a quiet moment with a book on a park bench or mingling with friends at an open-air cafe, today holds the potential for simple joys against a backdrop of splendid clarity.
